root: ^“Welcome to Exodus Ventures Incorporated! We’re so pleased to have you here today.”
^The screen crackled to life, the sound cutting in and out every other word.
^“Exodus is proud to be leading the tech world as the main developer in narrative artificial intelligence-based simulation analysis.
^Thank you for choosing us to be a part of your world today, and we appreciate your support as we roll out our first editions of the  SimuLoads virtual reccomender buds.
^…the video signed off with Exodus’s signature slogan. You never really understood why they referenced universes. It’s not like they were a space company or anything.
